feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-11T13:54:23.978876Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;人工智能炒作的耻辱墙</stitle>; <id>;https://criticalai.org/the-ai-hype-wall-of-shame/</id>; <updated >;2023-06-11T12:53:56.063647Z</updated>; <link href="https://criticalai.org/the-ai-hype-wall-of-shame/"/>; <author>; <name>;马班</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=marban</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp .com/criticalai.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/ahuQUlOb_400x400-150x150.jpg?resize=150%2C150&ssl=1" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;AI Hype Wall of Shame 是 Critical AI 和 DAIR Institute 的合作成果，旨在打击围绕人工智能的误导性炒作。他们使用受 Marvin the Paranoid Android 启发的评级系统来对 AI 炒作实例进行分类。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-ai-hype-wall-of-shame" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36280603" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;心理流动性</stitle>; <id>;https://collabfund.com/blog/mental-liquidity/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T12:53 :56.064242Z</updated>; <link href="https://collabfund.com/blog/mental-liquidity/"/>; <author>; <name>;bkohlmann</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=bkohlmann</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了心理流动性的重要性，即在出现新信息时迅速放弃先前信念的能力。作者强调了改变想法的困难和过分坚持信念的危险。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mental-liquidity" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36280772" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;CS:GO：从零到 0-day</stitle>; <id>;https://neodyme.io/blog/csgo_from_zero_to_0day/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T07:53:56.064658 Z</updated>; <link href="https://neodyme.io/blog/csgo_from_zero_to_0day/"/>; <author>; <name>;披萨</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=pizza</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://neodyme.io/assets/csgo.f41c0e91_1Aeymb.png" style="宽度：220px；高度： 124 像素；" />;<br />;在热门游戏《反恐精英：全球攻势》中发现了三个严重的远程代码执行漏洞。当游戏客户端连接到恶意服务器时，可能会触发漏洞，并提供了概念验证漏洞利用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cs-go-from-zero-to-0-day" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36279129" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;欧洲：义务兵役回归了吗？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.dw.com/en/europe-is-compulsory-military -service-coming-back/a-65880469</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T13:34:56.065061Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.dw.com/en/europe- is-compulsory-military-service-coming-back/a-65880469"/>; <author>; <name>;rntn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rntn</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;许多欧洲国家在过去 20 年中废除了义务兵役制，但与俄罗斯的冲突导致一些国家考虑重新引入义务兵役制。拉脱维亚计划从 2024 年起重新引入义务兵役制，而法国正在讨论一种“轻型”义务兵役制，而德国则面临就此问题进行全国辩论的呼声。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#europe-is-compulsory-military-service-coming-back" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36281208" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;550 万《孢子》用户上传了约 1.91 亿的作品，并且还在增加</stitle>; <id>;http://www.spore.com/rest/stats</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T08:53:56.065440Z</更新>; <link href="http://www.spore.com/rest/stats"/>; <作者>; <name>;DangerousYams</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DangerousYams</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;1913403223415594304103 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# 5-5m-spore-users-have-uploaded-some-191m-creations-and-counting" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36279341" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;为什么黑匣子不是更好？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.afar.com/magazine/how-black-boxes-changed-air-travel</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T10:53:56.065816Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.afar.com/magazine/how-black-boxes-changed-air-travel"/>; <作者>; <名称>;gus_leonel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gus_leonel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:/ /afar.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/bd882df/2147483647/strip/true/crop/1920x1080+0+0/resize/400x225!/quality/90/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fafar-media-production -web.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fbrightspot%2F25%2F66%2F3e0cc8cb4ccb9f73c4c0a7dc7f6a%2Fafar-logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;法航 447 航班黑匣子的回收提供了有关飞机最后时刻的关键信息，揭示了导致致命坠机的一系列事故。这一事件凸显了过度的危险- 对自动化的依赖，并导致了全球飞行员如何处理高海拔紧急情况的新培训程序。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-aren-t-black-boxes-better" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36280091" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我创建了 Clippy [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.youtube.com/watch?v=3kcQzCzSDvc</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T10:53:56.066194Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch ?v=3kcQzCzSDvc"/>; <author>; <name>;rhema</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rhema</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/3kcQzCzSDvc" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #i-created-clippy-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36257935" target="_blank">;[ comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;湾区德国酒吧那个降低了 Apple 著名的 iPhone 安全性</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sfgate.com/tech/article/bay-area-german-bar-iphone-security-breach-18130468.php</id>; <updated >;2023-06-11T09:53:56.066602Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.sfgate.com/tech/article/bay-area-german-bar-iphone-security-breach-18130468。 php"/>; <author>; <name>;wallflower</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wallflower</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://s.hdnux.com/photos/01/23/54/65/21941575/3/1200x0.jpg" style="宽度：220px； height: 147px;" />;<br />;2010 年，一位醉酒的 Apple 软件工程师将 iPhone 4 原型机留在德国啤酒馆内的高脚凳上，随后被盗并以 5,000 美元的价格卖给了科技博客 Gizmodo。该事件引起了媒体狂热和对当时首席执行官史蒂夫乔布斯勒索的指控。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-bay-area-german-bar-that-brought-down-apples-famed-iphone-安全" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270802" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在他成为 Unabomber 之前，Ted Kaczynski 是一个精神控制者测试对象</stitle>; <id>;https://www.washingtonpost.com/history/2023/06/11/unabomber-ted-kaczynski-harvard-experiment/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T09： 53:56.066991Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/history/2023/06/11/unabomber-ted-kaczynski-harvard-experiment/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;白漆</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=whitepaint</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www. washingtonpost.com/wp-apps/imrs.php?src=https://arc-anglerfish-washpost-prod-washpost.s3.amazonaws.com/public/G7IS3TPAHWWIGQ6RXWNOJF7HTU.jpg&w=1440" style="width: 220px; height: 155px;" />;<br />;Ted Kaczynski，被称为 Unabomber，曾是一名数学专业学生，后来成为国内恐怖分子，目标是学术界、科学家和工业化社会。他也是哈佛大学开展的一项实验的参与者中央情报局支持的心理学家 Henry A. Murray 试图了解如何控制受试者的思想。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#before-he-was-the-unabomber -ted-kaczynski-was-a-mind-control-test-subject" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36279639 " target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="文本">;开源的不对称性</stitle>; <id>;https://matt.life/writing/the-asymmetry-of-open-source</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T08:53:56.067376Z </updated>; <link href="https://matt.life/writing/the-asymmetry-of-open-source"/>; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://matt.life/resources/images/macbook-cover.jpg" 样式="宽度：220px； height: 125px;" />;<br />;开源的不对称性是可持续性问题的核心。虽然项目需要用户创建社区并在代码上进行协作，但没有它们它们仍然可以运行。本文讨论了不同的类型开源工作的重要性以及维护者和用户之间建立健康关系以确保可持续性的必要性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-asymmetry-of-open-source" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36279403" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;可搜索和排序的 H1B 工资数据库</stitle>; <id>;https://jobsort.com/ h1b</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T03:53:56.067754Z</updated>; <link href="https://jobsort.com/h1b"/>; <author>; <name>;jobsort</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jobsort</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;H1B 数据已过滤，仅包括软件工程、生物医学、管理人员和首席执行官。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#searchable-and-sortable-h1b-salary-database" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36277706" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Valid Python syntax – by Nobody has time for Python</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bitecode.dev/p/this-is-valid-python-语法</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T11:53:56.068128Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.bitecode.dev/p/this-is-valid-python-syntax"/ >; <author>; <name>;ankitg12</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ankitg12</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Ffe596e59 -4010-422a-b4f7-df7531fd4eca_948x948.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了 splat 运算符 (*) 在 Python 中的各种用法，包括解包参数、可变参数和解包 iterables。它还探讨了在数字文字和 f 字符串中使用下划线以允许任意代码。作者指出，虽然这些功能可能很强大，但如果使用过度，它们也会使代码变得不可读。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#valid-python-syntax-by-nobody-has-time-for-python" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36280214" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;机器人可以从 RAM 芯片中提取数据</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/09 /cold_boot_ram_theft/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T10:53:56.068559Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/09/cold_boot_ram_theft/"/>; <author>; <name>;laktak</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=laktak</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://regmedia.co.uk/2023/06/08/cryorobot_image.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;研究人员开发了一种内存窃取机，可以通过一次冻结设备上的一个 RAM 芯片来从 DDR3 内存模块中提取解密数据。该机器的成本约为 2,000 美元，它简化了冷启动攻击技术，使其不那么繁重。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#robot-can-rip-the-data-out-of-ram-chips" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36254073" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;奥本海默的情妇离奇死亡 (2015)</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.nuclearsecrecy.com/2015/12/11 /the-curious-death-of-oppenheimers-mistress/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T03:53:56.068988Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.nuclearsecrecy.com/2015 /12/11/the-curious-death-of-oppenheimers-mistress/"/>; <author>; <name>;benbreen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=benbreen< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.nuclearsecrecy.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/Jean-Tatlock.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; 高度: 88px;" />;<br />;曼哈顿最新一集 209 与让·塔特洛克 (Jean Tatlock) 相关的次要情节联系在一起，他可能已被为曼哈顿计划安全工作的情报人员谋杀。奥本海默与塔特洛克的故事得到了详细探讨，包括奥本海默在 1943 年秘密访问塔特洛克，当时情报人员正在跟踪这次访问。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-curious-death-of-oppenheimers-mistress-2015" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36277696" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat。 io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;购买整个 Egghead 软件商店 (2005)</stitle>; <id>;https://devblogs.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20050824-11/?p= 34463</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T07:53:56.069375Z</更新>; <link href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20050824-11/?p=34463"/>; <author>; <name>;kaladin-jasnah</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kaladin-jasnah</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/wp-content/uploads/sites/38/2019/02/ShowCover.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：290px；" />;<br />;Windows 95 的开发经理在当地的 Egghead 软件商店购买了每个 PC 程序的副本，以确保应用程序的兼容性。 Windows 95 团队成员被邀请负责最多两个程序，作为交换，他们必须在 Windows 95 发布后保留它们。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#buying-an-entire-egghead-software-store-2005" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36274644" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;小网站小奖</stitle>; <id>;https://tinyawards.net/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T03:53: 56.069776Z</updated>; <link href="https://tinyawards.net/"/>; <author>; <name>;noflag</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= noflag</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://asset.mmm.page/13/54757e3d654172a6eaf2f6ce16aa33/17ur1tz.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：230px ;" />;<br />;The Tiny Awards 是一个非商业奖项，由一个小型评选委员会颁发给体现小型、真诚网络理念的网站。获胜者将获得实物奖杯和 500 美元的现金奖励。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tiny-awards-for-small-websites" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36267362" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;CIA 2010 秘密通信网站</stitle>; <id>;https://cirosantilli.com/cia-2010-covert-communication-websites</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -11T08:53:56.070157Z</updated>; <link href="https://cirosantilli.com/cia-2010-covert-communication-websites"/>; <author>; <name>;hosteur</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hosteur</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cirosantilli/media/ master/cia-2010-covert-communication-websites/screenshots/feedsdemexicoyelmundo.com.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：159px；" />;<br />;文章讨论了中央情报局在 2000 年代末至 2010 年代初使用的秘密通信渠道网站，直到被目标国家发现，导致数项资产被监禁和处决。这篇文章提供了有关网站数量及其用途的信息，以及为发现更多此类网站所做的努力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cia-2010-covert-communication-websites" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36279375" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Merklizing 键/值存储以获得乐趣和利润</stitle>; <id>;https://joelgustafson.com/posts/2023-05-04/merklizing-the-key-价值商店的乐趣和利润</id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T02:53:56.070571Z</更新>; <link href="https://joelgustafson.com/posts/2023-05 -04/merklizing-the-key-value-store-for-fun-and-profit"/>; <author>; <name>;joelg</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =joelg</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://joelgustafson.com/posts/2023-05-04/Component%2017.png" style="宽度： 220 像素；高度：80 像素；" />;<br />;本文讨论了使用 Prolly Trees（一种 Merkle 树）有效地比较两个键/值存储的内容并识别差异。此功能有多种应用，包括作为 CRDT 系统的持久层和去中心化数据库的基础。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#merklizing-the-key-value-store-for-fun-and-profit" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36265429" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何引用 ChatGPT</stitle>; <id>;https://apastyle.apa.org/blog/how-to-cite-chatgpt< /id>; <更新>;2023-06-11T10:53:56.070962Z</更新>; <link href="https://apastyle.apa.org/blog/how-to-cite-chatgpt"/>; <作者>; <name>;汤姆特</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:/ /apastyle.apa.org/images/tim-mcadoo_tcm11-262299.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;APA Style 团队讨论了 ChatGPT 在研究论文中的使用和引用。他们提供了引用 ChatGPT 生成的文本的指南，并建议记录在附录或补充材料中创建的确切文本。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-cite-chatgpt" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36280026" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;1996 年粗略指南 2.0 的互联网之旅</stitle>; <id>;https://www.planetjones.net/blog/10-06-2023/a-trip- to-the-internet-in-1996-with-the-rough-guide-2.0.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T11:53:56.071337Z</updated>; <link href="https:/ /www.planetjones.net/blog/10-06-2023/a-trip-to-the-internet-in-1996-with-the-rough-guide-2.0.html"/>; <author>; <name>;planetjones </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=planetjones</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.planetjones .net/the-rough-guide/the-rough-guide-to-the-internet-book.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 242px;" />;<br />;作者回顾了 1996 年互联网和万维网的状态，如袖珍书《粗略指南 2.0》中所述。这本书涵盖了互联网速度、设备、社交媒体、电子商务、在线广告和通信方式等主题，让您得以一窥互联网的早期。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-trip-to-the-internet-in-1996-with-the-rough-guide-2-0" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36280393" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;奶酪、老鼠和吉芬商品</stitle>; <id>;https://timharford.com/2023 /06/奶酪老鼠和为什么我们中的一些人比其他人更穷/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T04:53:56.071745Z</updated>; <link href="https://timharford.com/2023/06/the-cheese-the-rats-and-why-some-of-us-are-poorer-than-others/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;背景</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=background</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// timharford.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Back_View-DD@0.5x-1-1024x654.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：141px；" />;<br />;得克萨斯州的实验室老鼠帮助经济学家发现了吉芬商品的存在，吉芬商品是由于消费者被逼到角落而价格上涨时会被更多消费的商品。基本食品与吉芬相邻，是买不起高级食品的人的最后选择。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cheese-rats-and-giffen-goods" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36265786" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;五种农业技术应对气候变化威胁</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wsj.com/articles/climate-change-will-upend-agriculture-here-有五种技术可以帮助 b854770f</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T06:53:56.072132Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.wsj.com/articles /climate-change-will-upend-agriculture-here-are-five-technologies-that-c​​ould-help-b854770f"/>; <author>; <name>;lxm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=lxm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.wsj.net/im-792993/?width=1278&size=1" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;气候变化对农业构成重大威胁，包括降雨量更大、冬天更严酷以及致病虫害。科学家预测，这些挑战将导致水土流失、生长条件发生变化以及害虫范围扩大。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#five-farming-technologies-tackle-climate-change-threats" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36266895" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat。 io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;将愚蠢的推文变成楔形文字平板电脑</stitle>; <id>;https://dumbcuneiform.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T22:53 :56.072511Z</updated>; <link href="https://dumbcuneiform.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;cainxinth</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =cainxinth</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://dumbcuneiform.com/content/polyglot/images/intro-image.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：113px；" />;<br />;这篇文章介绍了一种服务，该服务可以创建手掌大小的粘土板，上面刻有楔形文字以表示短消息，例如情书或推文。这些平板电脑是手工制作的，需要几周的时间来制作和运送。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#turn-dumb-tweets-into-cuneiform-tablets" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36275974" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;现代生活是垃圾：陶林的台北（2013）</stitle>; <id>;https://themillions.com/2013/06/modern-life-is-rubbish -tao-lins-taipei.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T05:53:56.072879Z</updated>; <link href="https://themillions.com/2013/06/modern-life- is-rubbish-tao-lins-taipei.html"/>; <author>; <name>;occurrence</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=occurrence</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;Eric liu：读台北，我想知道，他为什么恨我？，就像人们对恶霸或恐怖分子的疑惑一样。他的评论家说，读这本小说让我觉得这本小说对生命是危险和威胁的。她说，一本讽刺反选择者的书不如赞美其作者的书好，但总比反选择者好 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#modern-life-is- rubbish-tao-lins-taipei-2013" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36265759" target="_blank">; [评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;武汉实验室周内在 Covid 之前</stitle>; <id>;https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/inside-wuhan-lab-covid-pandemic-china-america-qhjwwwvm0</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T01 :53:56.073269Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/inside-wuhan-lab-covid-pandemic-china-america-qhjwwwvm0"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ricksunny</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ricksunny</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// www.thetimes.co.uk/imageserver/image/%2Fmethode%2Fsundaytimes%2Fprod%2Fweb%2Fbin%2F5aedcbf4-06ec-11ee-a1e5-6222cf71d60e.jpg?crop=1575%2C886%2C0%2C0&resize=360" style="宽度：220px； height: 124px;" />;<br />;在 Covid-19 大流行开始之际，中国武汉的科学家们正在进行危险的实验，将致命的冠状病毒结合起来制造一种新的变异病毒。据称，这些实验由中国军方资助，并一直保存对公众保密。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#inside-the-wuhan-lab-weeks-before-covid" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36276268" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;梭子鱼敦促更换而不是修补其电子邮件安全网关</stitle>; <id>;https://krebsonsecurity.com/2023/06/ barracuda-urges-replacing-not-patching-its-email-security-gateways/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T20:53:56.073699Z</updated>; <link href="https://krebsonsecurity. com/2023/06/barracuda-urges-replacing-not-patching-its-email-security-gateways/"/>; <author>; <name>;LinuxBender</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=LinuxBender</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://krebsonsecurity.com/b-mandiant/3.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 198px;" />;<br />;Barracuda Networks 已敦促客户更换其电子邮件安全网关 (ESG) 设备，而不是在攻击者利用以前未知的漏洞后仅应用软件更新。该公司表示，该恶意软件是在允许攻击者对设备进行持续后门访问的设备子集，并且在某些系统上发现了数据泄露的证据。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#barracuda-urges-replacing-not -patching-its-email-security-gateways" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36274525" target="_blank" >;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;杂货店合并？不是太好了</stitle>; <id>;https://waterwrights.net/grocery-mergers-not-so-good-january-16-2023/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T01:53:56.074071Z </updated>; <link href="https://waterwrights.net/grocery-mergers-not-so-good-january-16-2023/"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;此帐户已被暂停。有关详细信息，请联系您的托管服务提供商。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#grocery-mergers-not-so-good" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36264717" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Fluent – 用于听起来自然的翻译的本地化系统</stitle>; <id>;https://projectfluent.org/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T00:53 :56.074465Z</updated>; <link href="https://projectfluent.org/"/>; <author>; <name>;croes</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =croes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Fluent 是一个本地化系统，它通过使用多个类别的标识符和变体来简化翻译。它还包括其他消息可以引用的术语，以实现一致性和品牌修改。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fluent-a-localization-system-for-natural-sounding-translations" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36276791" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;伦敦电视工作室的不完整历史</stitle>; <id>;https://www.tvstudiohistory.co.uk/</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-11T02:53:56.074974Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.tvstudiohistory.co.uk/"/>; <author>; <name>;timthorn</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=timthorn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.tvstudiohistory.co.uk/wp-content/ uploads/2021/06/Homepage_top_image-e1623009924952-768x851.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：244px；" />;<br />;马丁·肯普顿 (Martin Kempton) 是一位退休的灯光总监，曾在伦敦的大部分电视演播室工作过，他在 2006 年创建了一个网站来记录这些演播室的历史。多年来，该网站不断更新，来自 350 多人的贡献，包括有关行业设施和定义的信息，以及一个支持行业技术专业人员的慈善机构 Backup Tech 的部分。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#an-incomplete-history-of-londons-television-studios" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36256133" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;计算机图形行业起步于犹他大学</stitle>; <id>;https://spectrum.ieee.org/history-of-computer-graphics -行业</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T13:53:56.075354Z</更新>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee.org/history-of-computer-graphics-industry"/>; <author>; <name>;sohkamyung</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sohkamyung</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/a-large-group-of-older-men-standing-for-a-group-portrait-some-sitting-on-chairs-in-front-and- others-standing-behind-them.jpg?id=34017358&width=1200&height=900" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;计算机图形行业的发展在很大程度上归功于 David Evans 和 Ivan E. Sutherland 的开创性工作，他们在 1960 年代和 70 年代在犹他大学进行了开创性的研究。他们的工作帮助推动了这个行业的发展，该行业现在严重依赖计算机图形和可视化技术来制作流行的电影和电视节目。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-computer-graphics-industry-got-started-at-the-university-of-utah" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36264744" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
